title: 2020 Polls, DOJ and Roger Stone Sentence
itunes:title: 2020 Polls, DOJ and Roger Stone Sentence
description:
Panel guests: Rafael Bernal, journalist with The Hill and The Hill Latino and Lincoln Mitchell, Political Analyst and Democratic activist.



Guest host June Grasso also talked to Frank O. Bowman, the Floyd R. Gibson Missouri Endowed Professor of Law at the University of Missouri about the decision by the DOJ to reduce the sentencing recommendation for Roger Stone.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
